useCase.name: Specify Remote Replication Policy for a Collection

mainSequence.step: Repository Manager accesses Replication Policy Settings through EDRMS Interface
Retrieves Current Policy Settings through Replication Policy Module
Queries Existing Policies from EDRMS Database
Returns Policies to Replication Policy Module
Shows Current Policies to EDRMS Interface
Defines/Updates Policy for Collection through EDRMS Interface
Processes Policy Specifications with Policy Patch
Confirms the Update of Policy in DB
Initiates Policy Replication Update with Remote Storage Service
Acknowledges Replication Policy Update to Policy Patch
Confirms Policy Update to EDRMS Interface
Shows Update Confirmation to Repository Manager
